author: jvanzyl
msg: o if we don't have a project then we don't have any pre/post goals.
this happens when we are initializing a project. maybe for the
initializing mode we should send in the parent POM. not sure yet.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o throw a configuration exception if a component can't be found we can't recover from that.
